mapper.select: SELECT /* fn: getCodesOrderMax, wr: shanepark, date: 2023-05-04 */ MIN(CODE_ORDER+1) AS ORDER_MAX FROM TBL_COMMON_CODE WHERE (CODE_ORDER + 1) NOT IN (SELECT CODE_ORDER FROM TBL_COMMON_CODE WHERE PARENTS_CODE = 'ROOT');

SELECT /* fn: getCommonCodeDetail, wr: shanepark, date: 2023-05-04 */ CC.COMM_SEQ AS commSeq , CC.COMMON_CODE AS commonCode , CC.PARENTS_CODE AS parentsCode , IFNULL(PCC.COMMON_NAME, '최상위') AS parentsName , REFER_ID1 AS referId1 , REFER_ID2 AS referId2 , CC.GROUP_CODE AS groupCode , CC.COMMON_NAME AS commonName , CC.COMMENT AS comment , CC.CODE_ORDER AS codeOrder , CC.USE_YN AS useYN , CC.DEL_YN AS delYN , CC.REG_USER AS regUser , CC.REG_DATE AS regDate , (SELECT COUNT(COMMON_CODE)+1 FROM TBL_COMMON_CODE WHERE PARENTS_CODE = #{commonCode}) AS orderMAx FROM TBL_COMMON_CODE CC LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COMMON_NAME , COMMON_CODE FROM TBL_COMMON_CODE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PARENTS_CODE = #{parentsCode} ) PCC ON CC.PARENTS_CODE = PCC.COMMON_CODE WHERE CC.COMMON_CODE = #{commonCode} AND CC.PARENTS_CODE = #{parentsCode} AND CC.GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode}
SELECT /* fn: getChildNodes, wr: shanepark, date: 2023-05-04 */ COUNT(1) FROM TBL_COMMON_CODE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PARENTS_CODE = #{commonCode} AND GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode}
